explains: adv. 一度（等于 onetime）；从前

sentences.en: At one time 400 men, women and children lived in the village.
sentences.cn: 曾一度有400个男人、女人和儿童住在这个村子。

sentences.en: The fish lay thousands of eggs at one time.
sentences.cn: 这种鱼一次产卵数千个。

sentences.en: At one time, walking across the room took all her strength.
sentences.cn: 曾经有段时间，穿过这个房间得用尽她全部的力气。
